entry.title: $2195 // ***HUGE 1 BEDROOMS***WONT LAST***CAL TODAY***NO FEES***
entry.content:
Gorgeous spacious 1 bedroom 1bath apartment, Conveniently located 2 blocks from the J/M/Z train lines at Myrtle Ave stop and close to various bus lines for a fast and easy commute.Steps away from many bars restaurants groceries laundromats and many shops, The building is clean quiet well maintained with a great super on premises, A MUST SEE!!!

The apartment features, 1 huge bedroom with closet, huge living room. hardwood floors, high ceiling, exposed brick, large windows with lots of natural light, gorgeous kitchen with stainless steel appliances, nice tiled full bath and much more. DON'T MISS OUT

For just $2200 a month with no brokers fee,
To schedule a private viewing and for more details contact Isidore anytime. show contact info
